item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, May 12, 2025 at 3:10 AM UTC
item.description:

29. Klarna changes its AI tune and again recruits humans for customer service (208 points | 84 comments)
30. SDFs and the Fast sweeping algorithm in Jax (19 points | 3 comments)
